discourse_list.title: Governance at a Glance: Jan. 29 - Feb. 4, 2021

content.content: Governance at a Glance! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm. Updated 2021/02/04 Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Demand surge continues with over 1.75B in DAI supply Our Surplus Buffer continues to fill at a moderate rate, currently sitting just under 6M DAI at the time of writing The DAI VWAP holds steady (currently at $1.001), despite continued volatility in ETH  ICYMI - Announcements  The January Maker Governance Review is live and really something! The Rates Group published new recommendations that will be polled for inclusion on Monday, Feb. 8th.  Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Undercollateralized loans in Maker - New @Hasu makes the case for a new type of loan to be brought to Maker. Core Units I Wished Existed - New @iammeeoh gives everyone a space to discuss Core Units they would like to see here at Maker. Check out the community ideas and leave one of your own! Seeking Consensus ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ IAM-DC Parameters: WBTC-A, LINK-A, UNI-A, COMP-A, YFI-A, AAVE-A - Signal Ending Soon! Just one more day left to give @primoz your opinion on the Debt Ceiling Instant Access Module levels for the above collateral types. Inclusion poll slated for Monday, Feb. 8th. [Signal Request] Adjust ETH-A DC-IAM-line (2021-04) - New! @ultraschuppi signals raising the ETH-A debt ceiling for the 4th time in 2021. You might be noticing a trend at this point. [Signal Request] Raise DSR - Signal Continues @ultraschuppi signals for varying levels of increase to the Dai Savings Rate which has been at 0% since September. [Signal Request] Adjust the Surplus Buffer - Signal Continues @ultraschuppi signals the raising of the Surplus Buffer, with options to continue MKR buyback and burn operations during the raise. Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance! Help Wanted ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Updated 2021/01/28 Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Total DAI supply hits another ATH above 1.6B Debt Ceilings have been raised and the revenues have followed! DAI growth per second up to 1.30 The DAI VWAP holds steady (currently at $1.001), despite some serious volatility in ETH  1600×455 56.2 KB ICYMI - Announcements  The USDC PSM Interface is live with plenty of room before we hit the DC  @blimpa has brought Maker News to your inbox! Sign up here   Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ IAM DC ETH-A Parameters - New @Primoz details the Risk Team’s assessment of increasing ETH exposure to the platform and what steps might be taken to mitigate the risks. Crash “in slow motion” scenario analysis - New @SebVentures expands on last week’s presentation on VaR, showcasing a different platform risk posed by the Box parameter. Seeking Consensus ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Adjust ETH-A Debt Ceiling - New! @ultraschuppi signals another increase to the ETH-A debt ceiling as vault users continue to utilize the collateral. [Signal Request] Raise DSR - New! @ultraschuppi signals for varying levels of increase to the Dai Savings Rate which has been at 0% since September. [Signal Request] Adjust the Surplus Buffer - New! @ultraschuppi signals the raising of the Surplus Buffer, with options to continue MKR buyback and burn operations during the raise. Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. discourse_list.title: Governance at a Glance: Feb. 26 - Mar. 4, 2021

content.content: Governance at a Glance! EDIT: Missed signals that has been added, sorry @ultraschuppi thanks for pointing that out! The one stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm. Updated 2021/03/04  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Another week, another ATH for DAI Supply! Currently sitting just north of 2.5B The most recent rates change has brought annualized revenues to 95M DAI. Despite plenty of volatility in the Crypto market this week, DAI continues to trade extremely close to it’s peg!  1600×493 109 KB  ICYMI - Announcements  Special thanks to @tadeo for bringing us What’s backing my Dai?: An interactive visualisation   February’s Governance Review has been posted! Take a walk through everything we’ve accomplished in the last month.   Active Discussions ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Could Dai be short squeezed like Gamestop? - New @peterssam brings a discussion about market pressures on DAI. [NS-DROP] and [SIXS] Implementation - New @MKR1 asks for an update on Real-World Asset progress and a discussion about next steps is underway!  Seeking Consensus ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Increase the bump / ttl parameters of FLAP auctions - New! @Aaron_Bartsch signals some changes to Flap (Surplus) auctions in light of other auction parameter implementations. [Signal Request] Adjusting Dust Parameter - Voting ends soon! @monet-supply signals community preference on increasing the Dust (minimum debt) parameter for the 2nd time in 2021. Voting concludes 3/10. [Signal Request] Adjust ETH-A DC-IAM-line - Polling extended! @ultraschuppi brings the 5th signal of the year requesting a larger line for the ETH-A vault type. [Signal Request] Adjust WBTC-A DC-IAM-line - New! @ultraschuppi proposes raising the WBTC line following a Risk Report on the state of WBTC.  Ongoing Initiatives ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis  bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!  Help Wanted ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
